mdRecord.dcterms:title: Photograph of Congressman Moore and his family in the back of a car
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Congressman Arch A. Moore, Jr and his family in the back of a convertible during a parade. The car has a sign on the side that says "Congressman Arch Moore, Jr. and family." The Moore's are all wearing flower lei's.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Capito, Shelley Moore, 1953
